• Navigate to the loan dashboard. [Acceptance Criteria: Scenario1]
• Select the HELOC loan account with Process Stop Code = 2. [Test Data: Loan Account: 123456, Process Stop Code: 2] [Acceptance Criteria: Scenario1]
• Verify the status of the 'Make a Payment' button. [Acceptance Criteria: Scenario1]
• Check for the ineligibility message displayed to the customer. [Acceptance Criteria: Scenario1]
